contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 8, 2017 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest
Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Upper Sections) 10 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-associat-3785
None
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Music adjudicator: David Hirst; Entertainment adjudicator: Cliff Parker. Commence: 9 am.
1st section: Music - 1 Michelmersh, 2 Bedford. Entertainment - 1 Bedford, 2 Michelmersh. Best Instrumentalist: Ella Walker & Henry Boler (xylophones), Michelmersh.
2nd section: Music - 1 Littleport, 2 Wantage Concert, 3 City of Coventry. Entertainment - 1 Wantage Concert, 2 Littleport, 3 City of Coventry. Best Instrumentalist: Andrew Cooper (soprano cornet), Littleport.
3rd section: Music - 1 Oxford Cherwell, 2 Hemel Hempstead, 3 Cold Ash, 4 East Coast, 5 Jubilee. Entertainment - 1 Hemel Hempstead, 2 Oxford Cherwell, 3 Jubilee, 4 East Coast, 5 Cold Ash. Best Instrumentalist: Steve Clapton (cornet), Oxford Cherwell.
4th section: Music - 1 Shipston, 2 Witney, 3 Wantage Academy, 4 Marsh Gibbon. Entertainment - 1 Marsh Gibbon, 2 Wantage Academy, 3 Shipston, 4 Witney. Best Instrumentalist: Luke Barker (cornet), Shipston.
Unregistered section: Music - 1 Blewbury Youth, 2 Chinnor Training, 3 Yarnton. Entertainment - 1 Blewbury Youth, 2 Yarnton, 3 Chinnor Training. Best Instrumentalist: Alice Knight (tenor horn), Blewbury Youth
Best Percussion of the Day: Michelmersh Best Tenor Horn of the Day: Daniele Sadler, Jubilee Best Conductor of the Day: Terry Brotherhood, Oxford Cherwell Best Soprano Cornet of the Day: Andrew Cooper, Littleport Most under-19 players: Blewbury Youth
Oct. 1, 2017, 2:52 p.m. Oct. 9, 2017, 2:32 p.m.
1 Littleport Brass Nicholas Garman
2 Michelmersh Silver Band Melvin White
3 Wantage Concert Brass Danny Dullforce
